data.name: 赌神模拟器：亚洲风云God Of Gamblers
data.detailed_description:
You are an agent, codename 996. One day, you accepted two secret missions from your beautiful boss: a terrorist organization planned a God of Gamblers contest, and conspired to win funds through the contest to launch a terrorist attack. Your superiors ordered you to sneak into the casino to participate in the game and win the grand prize of the God of Gamblers to thwart the plot of the terrorist organization. The second task is to retrieve a beautiful undercover policeman who had lost contact in the casino before. In order to complete these two tasks, you need to hang out with the beauties of the casino(PR), flirt and play sex games with them, and reward them with the money you win at the gambling table to gain a good impression. They can help you step by step to become a gambling master. At the same time, you have to spy information about the missing undercover from their mouths, and finally find her.

addictive gaming table
The gambling game in the game adopts the most popular baccarat in Asia. This kind of gameplay is simple and exciting, but if you want to win the game, you still need to keep practicing your gambling skills in the game. There are 7 levels in the game, and each level is set with corresponding tasks. Only by completing the tasks can you get diamond rewards. You can use diamonds to buy props that can improve your gambling skills or reward beauty PR. If you get enough favors, you can interactive with the beauty, and then you can unlock the next level by getting the level ring presented by her.

data.short_description: Participate in the God of Gamblers Tournament to compete for the position of God of Gamblers, date casino beauties, and whether you can gain goodwill is up to you.
data.supported_languages:
Japanese, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese, English
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64Bits
  • Processor: Intel Core™ Duo or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 | AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit | Windows 8 64-bit | Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K | AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 | AMD Radeon RX 570
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains adult themes and content that may not be suitable for all ages. These themes include nudity, strong language and dialogue with sexual hints
